name: Optinfra Enterpirse Platform
short_description:
Design and implement of ERP Model (very small size) app
Objective : Develop a architectural model and a development model for rapid application development .that provides --- Modularity, Re useability ,Extensibility .
 
This provides rapid application development environment , reusable, semi-complete infrastructure    that can be specialized to produce  applications. It doesn't include users' functionality.   but it is a platform   for developing java ee based  applications,  based on modular components.

   This  provides an architectural model and a development model.it also provides common java EE best practice ,   development guidelines, standards, methodologies and tools for development and maintenance.

   Components of the Framework can be used by  development teams to significantly increase productivity and   reduce total development time  of development and maintenance. 
https://www.ece.cmu.edu/~ece846/spring-2004/team2/index.ht
 contact me : optinfra.masum@gmail.com
summary: Don't reinvent the wheel. Just use existing popular java ee components
